overview: Starring magician Mark Wilson, his partner Nani Darnell Wilson, and Paul Frees as Poppin Fresh, the Pillsbury Doughboy. as you see sketches of performers doing magic and Pillsbury commercials also being shown too. Other people include illusionist Greg Wilson, Bev Bergeron as Rebo the Clown, Dai Vernon, Shimada, Jay Marshall, Rico, Carl Ballantine, and Art Metrano.
title: Pillsbury's Magic Circus
